entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
